messages.message: trying to delete columns from a ~40 column and ~100 row flow file (LC w2 processor) freezes my tab and to some extent my whole browser. i assume we know this is a limitation? should i preserve this refiner program (about to trim it down) to help someone look at it down the line?
yes - keep it? i can take a look
I think “delete column” is broken in the Refiner JS, @Kerry if you happen to want to take a look that would be great
i get the same result consistently as well, perhaps there might be an infinite loop somewhere
must be a recent thing. i really think it was possible in the past.
but i could be wrong. has it always been broken @dlluncor?
i can’t insert columns either btw. same side effect.
for the last several weeks hasn’t worked for me
perhaps it might work when there are few columns but not when there are numerous columns (20+?)
both worked for me with gusto, but yea breaking now that i have ~45 columns. will trim down columns and tell you if it works.
